hibernate-mapping.query: from com.redhat.rhn.domain.token.ActivationKey as ak where ak.key = :key
from com.redhat.rhn.domain.token.ActivationKey as ak where ak.token = :token and kickstartSession = null
select actKey from com.redhat.rhn.domain.token.ActivationKey actKey, com.redhat.rhn.domain.token.Token token where actKey.token = token and token.server = :server
from com.redhat.rhn.domain.token.ActivationKey as ak where ak.kickstartSession = :session
from com.redhat.rhn.domain.token.ActivationKey as ak where ak.token.org = :org
from com.redhat.rhn.domain.kickstart.KickstartData as k where :token member of k.defaultRegTokens
